ISSUE.TITLE: using ansible kubernetes module on ansible tower
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi, Does anyone know if it's possible to use the ansible kubernetes module (k8s) on AWX? I'm getting this error: _no module named kubernetes_. regards, Michel
